Text:
for Phase 2: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5463734/Gantz_Phase_Two_Complete

for Phase 3 up to issue 315: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5463747/Gantz_Phase_3__date
Is this a scanlation, of the official translation published by Dark Horse?
@deznaj no idea. I am not picky, as long as I can read it I'm good. The first 20 volumes are from some other torrent the rest are from http://www.thespectrum.net

The difference should be easy to spot. Scanlations are always a bit 'messy' and at some point all credit the scanner and translator.

But nevermind, I'll just download one chapter and see for myself. I am picky...

feel free to be as picky as you want, I could read everything just fine and if someone else out there wants to put together a cleaner torrent, they are welcome to. And of course all credit to original scanners and translators.
